types.section:
{{fr-noun|m|vélos-pupitres}}

# a combination of [[stationary bike]] and [[student desk]]; a student desk with a set of bicycle pedals attached, to allow stationary biking while reading, writing and in-classroom sit-down learning
types.html:
vélo-pupitre m (plural vélos-pupitres)

  1. a combination of stationary bike and student desk; a student desk with a set of bicycle pedals attached, to allow stationary biking while reading, writing and in-classroom sit-down learning
trans: a combination of stationary bike and student desk
a student desk with a set of bicycle pedals attached, to allow stationary biking while reading, writing and in-classroom sit-down learning
